Params: {3: 'She has been through countless cycles, rewound the river of time, and drifted in a sea of mortal coils.'}
{3: 'She has seen too many flattering smiles and crying faces. She has felt too many attitudes, passionate or indifferent.'}
{3: 'She has walked into a magnificent palace and a beautiful garden and been to an artificial fountain that emits a delightful fragrance.'}
{3: 'She has witnessed how people give up on cultivating dry lands, how debris is scattered on the streets, and how gravestones appear everywhere around the world. The horizon is dark.'}
{3: "The dragon's wings cast a shadow on the ground."}
{3: 'So, she starts playing with her pipe.'}
{3: 'Souls start floating. She cuts through the shadow with her singing voice. The physical body is ravaged and broken.'}
{3: 'She has many clones, and they are all suffering.'}
{3: 'She is not aware of how much time has passed.'}
{3: "The negative voices have left her. Malice and misunderstandings don't mean anything anymore. She hears everyone's thoughts and sees her own wish."}
{3: 'She sees farmlands overgrown with grains and grassy hillsides where sheep roam.'}
{3: 'She sees plains covered in green grass and river banks where cowslips and pampas grass grew.'}
{3: 'She sees waves washing against the seashore and rainbows after a storm.'}
{3: 'She sees all the magnificent and romantic views this world has to offer.'}
{3: 'It is peaceful and full of life.'}
{3: 'The world without an evil dragon. The world without her.'}
